response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, but considering its importance to you, we believe it would be a perfect match. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $11,000. We understand its worth to you is $12,000, and we aim to bridge that gap while ensuring both parties benefit. Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 11000}
